name: Passive vs Active
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: This stream will explore the pros and cons of mechanical versus natural cooling and ventilation and the economic case for investing in active systems when a passive solution may already be available to the building.  In addition, this session will cover mechanical & electrical systems case studies on education of users and use behaviour to from the passive perspective.

presentations.name: The impact on indoor air quality when evaluating natural versus mechanical solutions
presentations.speakers: Neville Rye, Director, WSP Sustainable Buildings Group

presentations.name: Making intelligent choices between active and passive systems
presentations.speakers: Paul Hancock, Chair, B&ES Technical Committee, Crown House Technologies

presentations.name: Future for active thinking
presentations.speakers: Professor Ahmed Al-Shamma’a, Director of BEST Research Institute, School of Built Environment, Liverpool John Moores University

presentations.name: Innovative solution for passive
presentations.speakers: Rupert Soar, Nottingham Trent University; and Free Form Construction
